text:
Xiaomi released a jacket for severe Russian frost
01 Nov 2019, 09:45 by Victor Podvolotsky
It uses material used by NASA for space suits of astronauts.
Xiaomi, together with the DMN brand, has released a universal jacket that is suitable for both cool autumn and severe winter frosts. It will be quite warm and comfortable even at air temperatures up to -40 ¬∞ C.



In this jacket, it is not so much the resistance to frost that surprises as the appearance itself - it looks like an insulated windbreaker. The thickness of the lining is only a few millimeters, but this was enough to withstand even exposure to liquid nitrogen with a temperature of -196 ¬∞ C. In such a test, a temperature of 37.2 ¬∞ C remained under the jacket.



Such incredible properties are provided by the three-layer structure of the material, which is based on airgel. It has an extremely low thermal conductivity, which NASA engineers highly praised - the airgel is used as an insulating material for cosmonaut spacesuits.



On the inside of the jacket over the airgel, a special fabric with silver ions is used that perfectly reflects the heat of the human body. The outer layer has a multi-level water-repellent impregnation that protects from snow and rain.



The jacket also has a removable hood, double-sided main zipper, adjustable Velcro cuffs and a windproof skirt. All this with a total weight of only 400 grams. You can wash the jacket directly in the machine.



There are two colors to choose from, black and sand, at a price of 399 yuan (‚âà3,700 rubles). While the order can be made only in China, but after December 7, the jacket should appear on AliExpress.
